thread.section_title: Waldorf Astoria Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Could not have been treated better
thread.title_full: Could not have been treated better - Review of Waldorf Astoria Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Jeffrey C
title: Could not have been treated better
text: Waldorf Astoria Beijing was a fabulous experience with amazing attention to detail. Staff was helpful and always went the extra mile. Location was perfect and a 20 min walk to T Square. Great shopping and restaurants nearby and extremely safe area. Staff bent over backwards to make our stay special.
